text: Herviella albida is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella albida Baba, 1966. Accessed on 2018-02-18. ==Distribution== This species was described from Japan.Rudman, W.B., 2001 (May 22) Herviella albida Baba, 1966. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1966
title: Herviella albida
